common.contactInformation: Puede comunicarse con el soporte de su organización, DISPLAYNAME, en EMAIL.

body: Error de inicio de sesión en el servicio al que intentó acceder. Consulte a continuación las posibles razones y acciones.
El servicio al que intentó acceder no obtuvo todos los atributos necesarios para la identificación y / o personalización.
Esto puede deberse a que a su institución le faltan esos atributos o que su institución no está configurada para liberar esos atributos al servicio al que intentó acceder.

Comuníquese con el soporte de su institución e incluya el nombre del servicio al que intentó acceder, cualquier atributo que falte si sabe cuáles son (es posible que el servicio le haya informado) y, si es posible, una captura de pantalla del mensaje de error en el servicio ( incluida la barra de direcciones en la parte superior del navegador web) y también de este mensaje.
The service you tried to access failed during the authentication stage.
This may be because it requires additional steps which did not occur during login (such as using a second factor). Please try again.

If you cannot resolve the issue yourself, please contact support at your institution and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
The service that you tried to access requires privileges that you do not have.
Typical requirements include:

A confirmed user account, or "high" identity assurance level (AL)
To confirm your user account, you need to visit IT Service Desk and identify yourself using your national ID card or passport.

Affiliation
Your affiliation describes your relationship with the Blue Star University. The set of attributes include for example student and employee. If you are a student and the service you tried to access did not receive the student affiliation, please contact IT Service Desk to correct this.

Some specific entitlements
Entitlements are specific privileges at specific services. If you are missing entitlements that you think you should have (e.g. you should be able to access this service), please contact IT Service Desk to resolve this.

If you think you should have access, please contact support at your institution and include the name of the service you tried to access, any privileges that were noted as missing and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
The service you tried to access requires a verified user account, also known as SWAMID AL3.

Identities are often verified by visiting the IT service desk of your institution and identifying yourself using your national ID card or passwport. In addition to this two-factor authentication is required during login.

Please contact support at your institution, verify your user account and try again. If you already are verified, please contact support at your institution and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
The service you tried to access requires a confirmed user account, also known as SWAMID AL2.
Identities are often confirmed by visiting the IT service desk of your institution and identifying yourself using your national ID card or passwport.

Please contact support at your institution, confirm your user account and try again. If you already are confirmed, please contact support at your institution and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.

context.header: SWAMID base level user account required
body: The service you tried to access requires a user account fulfulling the base level of SWAMID, also known as SWAMID AL1.
Your user account most likely fulfills this but your institution may not be configured to release this to the service you tried to access.

Please contact support at your institution and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
An error occurred when accessing the service.

If you think you should be able to access the service, please contact support at your institution and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
